scripts.build-debug: browserify index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] > magnet.min.js
scripts.build: browserify index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] | uglifyjs -cm > magnet.min.js
scripts.jquery-build-debug: browserify jquery-plugin.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] > jquery-magnet.min.js
scripts.jquery-build: browserify jquery-plugin.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] | uglifyjs -cm > jquery-magnet.min.js
scripts.all-build-debug: npm run build-debug & npm run jquery-build-debug
scripts.all-build: npm run build & npm run jquery-build
